comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: I think this is an error on Bain's part. I believe this is Major General William P. Biddle, Commandant of the Marine Corps at that time. He had just established the "Advanced Base Force" in Dec. 1913. See: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_P._Biddle He is older and without mustache in the wiki photo, but notice that the fellow in Bain's photo is wearing captain's bars on his epaulettes.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
rjones0856:

Thanks for the heads up. Several other photographs of Maj. Gen. William P. Biddle in our non-digitized holdings, including another copy of this very Bain image, confirm that he is William P., not William F. We will correct this record when we update.
